author: fmcgorenc
name: Modern Mint Light
description:
A simple, modern take on the Cinnamon desktop.
 
Modern Mint strives to be light on resources (/cinnamon folder is around 290kB in size including thumbnail.png), modern and easily customizable.
 
Background colors can be easily customized because I moved all the relevant color values to the top of the script (cinnamon.css). Have a look and play around with it.
 
Icons are from Windows 10 Transformation Pack (http://gnome-look.org/content/show.php/Windows+10+Transformation+Pack?content=171327)
 
CC-BY-SA

Modern Mint strives to be light on resources (/cinnamon folder is around 290kB in size including thumbnail.png), modern and easily customizable.
 
Background colors can be easily customized because I moved all the relevant color values to the top of the script (cinnamon.css). Have a look and play around with it.
 
This pack contains three themes: a dark one, a light one and a dark one with light popup menus.
